```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
path <- "/Users/jieun/Downloads/datasci611-gh-pages-4/data/project2_2019"
files <- list.files(path)

for (i in 1:length(files)) {
  name <- substr(files[i],1,nchar(files[i])-4)
  assign(name, data.table::fread(file=paste0(path,"/",files[i])))
}
rm(i,name,path,files)
```

## Choose Variables

```{r}
datasets <- ls()

varnames <- function(i) {
  get(datasets[i]) %>% colnames()
}

lapply(1:16, function(x) varnames(x)) %>% unlist() %>% unique()

```
